name: ONE OFF TEENY BISCUIT TINS (only 5 available!)
description:
Totally perfect and super teeny borrower sized biscuit tins! 
Available as a necklace or a ring these guaranteed conversation pieces will make everyone who spies them smile (and maybe make them a little bit peckish too). 
Tin measures approx 2cm across x 1cm high available on an adjustable ring back to suit most sizes or an 18" silver tone chain. please specify whether you want a necklace or ring when placing your order.

name: TEA BREAK HEAVEN RING! LAST 2 EVER LEFT!
description:
The perfect ring to wear to coffee mornings, tea breaks, and anywhere you want to make everyone hungry!

A veritable smorgasbord of Lilliputian sized teeny biscuits on a china plate, all ready & waiting for the teeny kettle to boil! Can you spot your favourite?

Adjustable ring base to fit fingers from Lilliputian to Gulliver sized & everywhere in between

see pics for an idea of scale

Note: youll need to treat it with love & care & remember that teeny plates of biscuits dont like moshing, or drunken antics or anything else that might try and knock them off their plate, so wearers must be on their bestest behaviour at all times!

NOTE: ITEMS ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. THEY ARE NOT TOYS & ARE NOT EDIBLE. PLEASE KEEP THEM SAFELY OUT OF REACH WHEN THEY ARE NOT BEING WORN. DO NOT EAT! 


Comes gift boxed via recorded delivery 

Happy Customers Say:

Nat: so yeah, i'll be getting this on payday!!!! =D
its amazing!!!!

Vikky: Oh my god!!! thats soooooo cute!!

name: ROUND SHORTBREAD NECKLACE / BROOCH
description:
Shortbread, once an expensive luxury for special occasions like Christmas, Hogmanay and weddings. In Shetland, it is traditional to break a decorated shortbread cake over the head of a new bride on the entrance of her new house. 
Now blushing brides have another option without the worry of calories or crumbs with this biscuity tribute. 
Replica round shortbread biscuit measures a whopping 6cm (approx) diameter in necklace or brooch form. (not just for brides tho, everyone can be the recipient of one of these lovelies!)

name: We Love Biscuits! Please Click Here!
description: FACT: Biscuits are just plain fab & the perfect companion for a cup of tea & a natter. BEWARE OF IMITATIONS! These unique, HAND MADE! creations come from an obsession with the finest british biscuits that spurred us to create wearable versions to show the world just how much we love them & now ’we've decided to let you in on the biscuity worship. Each one is made by hand from scratch and isnt fimo or rubber like some of the 'tributes' that have been popping up recently (obviously very flattering but nothing to do with us!) If you want a genuine Biscuit Boutique piece then make sure you get it here! So thanks for looking at our creations & feel free to enquire if your questions arent answered in our FAQ (in the help section on the right of the page). You can contact us via the contact form (also in the help section) or by emailing biscuitboutique@hotmail.co.uk Happy Dunking x NOTE: ITEMS ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. THEY ARE NOT TOYS & ARE NOT EDIBLE. PLEASE KEEP THEM SAFELY OUT OF REACH WHEN THEY ARE NOT BEING WORN. DO NOT EAT! (P.S. please dont add this to your cart unless you want to send us a free penny!) P.P.S. No biscuits were harmed in the making of these tributes, they are not real, & will last forever as long as you look after them! You can also follow us on Twitter @biscuitboutique & like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Biscuit-Boutique/120937274660439 for general rambling & occasional discounts & exclusives woo! x

name: BISCUIT KEYRINGS
description:
Bourbon on your house keys? Party ring on your car keys? Whatever your biscuit of choice is you can have it on your keys yay!
Party Rings 4 colours £15 each
Malted Milk £15 each 
Dodger/Bourbon/Pink Wafer £12 each

description: Perfectly miniature versions of our double sided party rings ready to adorn your ear lobes! Guaranteed to make people hungry & jealous at the same time! Each party ring measures approx 3cm diameter, has the signature 'icing' top and biscuity back (see pics) & hangs on a plated fish hook ear wire. Pretty tasty eh? We think you'll agree.......! description: OMG! Possibly the BIGGEST biscuit we've ever done, this beauty is a statement piece that's guaranteed to get you noticed! Life size replica jam sandwich biscuit with a cream filling & our signature red glitter 'jam' filling measures approx a WHOPPING 5cm diameter x 1.5cm thick & hangs on a string of GIANT 2cm diameter pearls. The pearls are 20 inches long with a 3 inch extender to wear snug or loose depending on your mood. The perfect statement piece to make you look even more tasty, these beauties are available in limited quantities so grab one while you can! Available in yellow, pink, orange & purple with contrasting stripes totally unique and 100% hand made, no two will ever be the same! name: THE ORIGINAL JAMMY DODGER RING!
description:
As seen on T4 Frock Me!! (Cardiff Episode) Im sure youll agree this is one of the world’s finest biscuits, so why not pay tribute in ring form! Each non-edible tribute is unique, hand made & based on a real biscuit (so it might be a bit wonky but that just adds to the charm!) Instead of a jam centre these little beauties are filled with a sparkly centre you can choose when ordering, in loads of different colours!!! Also in this range look out for the matching brooch & necklace options so you can show the world your favourite biscuit in every way yay! Dodger measures approx 25mm diameter on adjustable ring back 100% unique & totally hand made, they only look good enough to eat, so please NO NIBBLING!

Note: All orders now sent recorded delivery as standard & no charge for additional items! NOTE: ITEMS ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. THEY ARE NOT TOYS & ARE NOT EDIBLE. Ruby: Im very happy with the jammy dodger ring and custard cream necklace I ordered, people keep commenting on them. AJ: just ordered myself a jammy dodger ring =] been wantin 1 for ages an cant wait for it 2 arrive YAY x

name: THE ORIGINAL JAMMY DODGER HAIR BOW!
description:
Calling all bow lovers! You’ve been struggling with the dilemma for so long now – you love bows, you love biscuits, but till now there has been no way to combine the two loves…(perhaps eating a biscuit while wearing a bow, but that just never quite hit the spot). Well Fear not! You can finally unite your loves in one perfect form, and even better, you can pick the colour of your love! Check the pics for some examples, i’m sure you’ll agree they are rather tasty! Satin ribbon bow on a sturdy 80mm metal barrette clip, topped with a sparkle filled dodger Don’t forget to pay the rest of the jam filled clan a visit if you’re wanting anything else to complete your collection! Note: If you don't specify a colour by email or message to seller when checking out youll get a random bow of our choosing, 100% unique & totally hand made, they only look good enough to eat, so please NO NIBBLING!

Note: All orders now sent recorded delivery as standard & no charge for additional items! NOTE: ITEMS ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. THEY ARE NOT TOYS & ARE NOT EDIBLE. PLEASE KEEP THEM SAFELY OUT OF REACH WHEN THEY ARE NOT BEING WORN. DO NOT EAT! Happy Customers Say: Vicky: The bow came today, thank you. Its lovely :)
